import{ActionTypes}from"../constant/actions";// #region Section :- Document
// To fetch all product  data 
export var action_fetchProductList=function action_fetchProductList(){return{type:ActionTypes.GET_PRODUCTS.GET_PRODUCTS_FETCH_DATA};};// to fetch the product based on category 
export var action_fetchProductByCategory=function action_fetchProductByCategory(payload){return{payload:payload,type:ActionTypes.GET_PRODUCTS.GET_PRODUCT_BY_CATEGORY_DATA};};// to fetch the single product  
export var action_fetchSingleProduct=function action_fetchSingleProduct(payload){return{payload:payload,type:ActionTypes.GET_PRODUCTS.GET_SINGLE_PRODUCT_DATA};};// to sorting product price  
export var action_sortProductPrice=function action_sortProductPrice(payload){return{payload:payload,type:ActionTypes.GET_PRODUCTS.SORT_PRODUCT_PRICE};};// to set  quantity price  
export var action_setQuantity=function action_setQuantity(payload){return{payload:payload,type:ActionTypes.GET_PRODUCTS.SET_PRODUCT_QUANTITY};};// to set cart quantity price  
export var action_setCartQuantity=function action_setCartQuantity(payload){return{payload:payload,type:ActionTypes.GET_PRODUCTS.SET_CART_QUANTITY};};// for mobile view  
export var action_setMenuBarStatus=function action_setMenuBarStatus(payload){return{payload:payload,type:ActionTypes.GET_PRODUCTS.SET_MENUBAR_STATUS};};// to set total price value
export var action_setTotalPrice=function action_setTotalPrice(payload){return{payload:payload,type:ActionTypes.GET_PRODUCTS.SET_TOTAL_PRICE_STATUS};};
